post.title: fs-commands
post.content:
lsblk - list block devices

Copy iso to usb

dd - disk dump dd if=~/Downoloads/archlinux.iso of=/dev/sdb status="progress"

Check if pc supports uefi

ls /sys/firmware/efi/efivars

Select wifi from terminal

prefer ethernet cable wifi-menu

Sync time from network

timedatectl set-ntp true

Manipulate partition

fdisk /dev/sdb boot partition - 200MB swap partition - 150% ram size (6G) root partition - C disk size home partition - D disk size w (write and wipe all)

make filesystem

mkfs.ext4 /dev/{boot,root,home} mkfs.ext4 boot partition mkfs.ext4 root partition mkfs.ext4 home partition

make swap partition

mkswap /dev/{swap} swapon /dev/{swap}

automatic partition mount on boot

this file does that vim /etc/fstab

genfstab -U /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab

archchroot /mnt

pacman -S networkmanagar
